statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE create_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, resolution_status FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE create_date < NOW() ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY create_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status='Open'
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, create_date FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status='Resolved' ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE customer_name='John Doe'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM CustomerServiceTickets
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM customer_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_status, created_at FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolution_status FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, created_at FROM customer_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, history_id, action_taken, action_timestamp FROM customer_tickets INNER JOIN ticket_history ON customer_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_history.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, resolution_status FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, created_at FROM customer_tickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT th.history_id, ct.customer_name, th.action_taken, th.action_timestamp FROM ticket_history th JOIN customer_tickets ct ON th.ticket_id = ct.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, resolution_status FROM CustomerServiceTickets ORDER BY resolution_status DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM CustomerServiceAgents WHERE department = 'Support';
SELECT DISTINCT resolution_status FROM CustomerServiceTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, action_taken FROM CustomerServiceTickets INNER JOIN TicketHistory ON CustomerServiceTickets.ticket_id = TicketHistory.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, resolution_status FROM CustomerServiceTickets WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerServiceTickets INNER JOIN TicketHistory ON CustomerServiceTickets.ticket_id = TicketHistory.ticket_id WHERE TicketHistory.agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM CustomerServiceAgents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'A%' AND department = 'Support';
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceAgents LEFT JOIN TicketHistory ON CustomerServiceAgents.agent_id = TicketHistory.agent_id ORDER BY TicketHistory.action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, timestamp, notes FROM ticket_history WHERE agent_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM tickets LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM agents WHERE department = 'Support' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, timestamp, notes FROM ticket_history WHERE agent_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, priority FROM CustomerTickets WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT comment_id, commenter_name, comment_text FROM TicketComments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, status FROM CustomerIssues WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT issue_description, resolution_date FROM CustomerIssues WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM CustomerTickets ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT comment_id, commenter_name, comment_text FROM TicketComments WHERE ticket_id = 3;
